QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, int_external_data.id odf_pk, int_external_data.code as code, int_external_data.IS_ACTIVE as is_active, int_external_data.im_id as im_id, int_external_data.external_api_alias as external_api_alias, CREATED.FULL_NAME as created_by, int_external_data.external_data_type as external_data_type, int_external_data.external_opt_id as external_opt_id, int_external_data.external_attr_name as external_attr_name, int_external_data.external_attr_id as external_attr_id, int_external_data.external_obj_id as external_obj_id, int_external_data.external_obj_uuid as external_obj_uuid, int_external_data.NAME as name, UPDATED.FULL_NAME as updated_by, int_external_data.external_obj_name as external_obj_name, INT_EXTERNAL_DATA.CREATED_DATE as created_date, odf_ca_int_external_data.partition_code as partition_code, INT_EXTERNAL_DATA.LAST_UPDATED_DATE as last_updated_date, int_external_data.extended_data_type as extended_data_type from int_external_data int_external_data, int_integrationmappings int_integrationmappings, srm_resources CREATED, srm_resources UPDATED, odf_ca_int_external_data odf_ca_int_external_data where 1 = 1 and int_external_data.im_id = int_integrationmappings.id and int_external_data.created_by = CREATED.user_id and int_external_data.last_updated_by = UPDATED.user_id and int_external_data.id = odf_ca_int_external_data.id
